v_required.err: Please select the client visit date.

fields.label: Pregnancy intention
fields.label_info_text: Client's intention or desire in the next year to either become pregnant or prevent a pregnancy.

options.text: Client does not want to become pregnant

v_min.err: Height must be equal or greater than 50

v_max.err: Height must be equal or less than 250

v_min.err: Weight must be equal or greater than 30

v_max.err: Weight must be equal or less than 250

v_min.err: SBP must be equal or greater than 20

v_max.err: SBP must be equal or less than 260

v_min.err: DBP must be equal to or greater than 20

v_max.err: DBP must be equal to or less than 260

fields.label: Is the client currently on another method?
Is the client currently on another method?

values: Does not want to use contraception
Partner/family member does not want the client to use contraception
Sterile or infertile for non-contraceptive reasons
History of female or male sterilization
Forgot to use contraception/lapse in use

fields.label: Client gave birth in the last 6 months
Miscarriage or abortion stage of pregnancy

fields.label_info_text: Whether or not a sexually-transmitted infection (STI) risk assessment was conducted.
fields.label: STI risk assessment conducted

options.text: Separated from regular sex partner(s) for long periods of time
No condom use during sex with partner known to have an STI
History of STI in the last year

fields.label: Increased risk of STIs
fields.label_info_text: Whether or not the client is at an increased risk of STIs as determined by the STI risk assessment factors.

fields.label: Gender-based violence (GBV) risk assessment conducted
fields.label_info_text: Whether or not an assessment was conducted to determine if the client has a risk of being subjected to violence.

options.text: Repeated health consultations with no clear diagnosis
Woman's partner or husband is intrusive during consultations
Woman often misses her own or her children's health-care appointments
Children have emotional and behavioural problems
Woman suspected or confirmed to be subjected to intimate partner violence or sexual violence

fields.hint: Risk factors for intimate partner violence or sexual assault

values: Partner can feel IUD strings during intercourse
Mood changes or changes in sex drive
Change in timing of monthly bleeding
Difficulty persuading partner to use method
Condom squeaks or makes noise during sex
Difficulty persuading partner to use method
Condom squeaks or makes noise during sex
